H0.text: Oxygen is what reptiles are unable to absorb through their skin because of scales.

H1.text: Food is what reptiles are unable to absorb through their skin because of their scales.

H2.text: Water is what reptiles are unable to absorb through their skin because of scales.

H3.text: Carbon is what reptiles cannot absorb through their skin because of their scales.

A4.text: Reptilian skin is covered in a horny epidermis, making it watertight and enabling reptiles to live on dry land
